name: Please Make It Stop
description:
Please Make It Stop

a game for the Summer Slow Jams July 2019 with the creative theme "One More Time!" and the constraints of having only 3 buttons and 3 colors.

Play a vast variety of levels! /s

Can you make it through all of them?

Feel free to share your statistics ;)

How to Play

You can control the player with more than three buttons (due to convenience reasons) but you only have three actions to perform.

Move Left: A or Left Arrow
Move Right: D or Right Arrow
Jump: W, Spacebar or Up Arrow

You can also play with a gamepad. (May not work correctly for Windows version)
